summary:
A contractor (business associate) working in the Fee Basis section at the medical center accessed a patients CPRS records without authorization. the patient 
called the Aternate PO to complain that her ex-partner told her the contractor looked in the patient record. A sensitive access log was requested to ISO. The log 
revealed the contractor had accessed the records. The Business Associate has taken disciplanary steps on their employee and the employee was also required to retake VA ISO & VHA Privacy trng courses.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
